description: Detects a suspicious curl process start the adds a file to a web request Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Scripts created by developers and admins
name: Suspicious Curl File Upload
query: (process.executable:*\\curl.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \-F\ * OR *\ \-T\ * OR *\ \-\-upload\-file\ * OR *\ \-d\ * OR *\ \-\-data\ *))
